knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(naniar)
``` 

```{r cars}
Sactemp <- read.csv("~/Documents/ECS32A/HW5/MovingAve.csv")
```

```{r}
Sactemp %>% 
  mutate(year=as.factor(Year)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=Value))+
  geom_line()+
  labs(title="Sacramento July Temperatures",
       x="Years",
       y="Temperature Anomaly")
```
